actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide veterans' benefits in the case of any veteran who during the period beginning on June 1, 1914, and ending on May 8, 1916, served in Mexico, on the borders thereof, or in the water adjacent thereto.

summary.text: Provides veterans' benefits to veterans who served in or along the borders of Mexico from June 1, 1914 through May 8, 1916.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide veterans' benefits in the case of any veteran who during the period beginning on June 1, 1914, and ending on May 8, 1916, served in Mexico, on the borders thereof, or in the water adjacent thereto.
